articles.description: It started as a night full of optimism in Sydney, with thousands desperate to see Australia create Women's World Cup history - but England had other ideas.
articles.title: How England crashed Australia's party to reach final

articles.description: Watch highlights as goals from Ella Toone, Lauren Hemp and Alessia Russo help England book a place in their first Women's World Cup final by beating Australia 3-1.
articles.title: 'Incredible' England beat Australia to reach World Cup final

articles.description: Watch Alessia Russo score England's third goal to help book their place in the Women's World Cup final for the first time.
articles.title: 'Absolutely sublime!' Russo nets England's third to seal place in final

articles.description: Sarina Wiegman says it's a 'fairytale' to lead England to the final of the World Cup and reach her fourth major tournament final overall.
articles.title: Wiegman & England's World Cup 'fairytale' continues

articles.description: Manchester City have won the Super Cup for the first time by beating Sevilla 5-4 on penalties after a 1-1 draw.
articles.title: Man City beat Sevilla on penalties to win Super Cup

articles.description: The teenager. The prospect. The bolter. The late substitute. At Moscow 2013, an unfunded, unlikely quartet ended a 29-year wait for a British female sprint medal at a major championships.
articles.title: 'What the hell do we do?' - Moscow misfits who started an era

articles.description: Venus Williams is unable to win back-to-back matches for the first time since 2019, despite leading Zheng Qinwen by a set and a break in Cincinnati.
articles.title: Williams loses 11 games in a row in Cincinnati exit

articles.description: Manchester United say no decision has made about Mason Greenwood's future which is still the "subject of intensive internal deliberation".
articles.title: Man Utd reveal 'intensive deliberation' over Greenwood

articles.description: World Aquatics to debut a new open category for transgender athletes at this year's Swimming World Cup event in Berlin.
articles.title: World Cup to debut open category for trans swimmers

articles.description: Watch the best plays from day 16 of The Hundred 2023, including Ackermann's wicket, Southby runs-out Jones and a six that hits a spectator.
articles.title: Moeen's 'ripping' wicket features in Plays of the Day
